page.title: 06FARMING IN WELFORD
page.content:
Bank farm has 203 acres of land which has ewes,lambs & crops (wheat,barley & oats) on it.Mr. Rainbow is occasionly helped by Mr. Barnes with various jobs.Mr. Rainbow helps various people with farming and other jobs including the Davies family.His main implements are tractor,trailer,drill & combine.They have lived at Bank Farm for 7 years.The barn was built before the house.Mr. Rainbows sheep are Mule & Masham ewes with their cross_bred Sulfolk lambs.He likes farming because of the country way of life and working with animals.In Autumn he sells his lambs & ewes at Stratford & Honeybourne lamb sales.
************* *ALEX & JOHN* *************
